author: Southdown Disco
comment: Only had it half an hour. Crashed three times. Wont play tracks when you press play. Automix cuts in late. Paid for automix. Had to restart device to close app. Integrates with spotify but search time means previous track is finished before next one is cued. Would be no use at any party.

author: Richie Setiawan
comment: Please make time stretch feature available on lenovo yoga book currenly running android lollipop. The pitch sounds awful and i cant mix tracks with those. Plesase include the feature.

author: David Swain
comment: Bought all the updates as changed platforms (ios to android). Totally useless on android, music stutters or slows when changing tracks, sometimes crashes the app! Why such a difference between the two operating systems? If I could give less than one star I would. Please fix this and I'll give a good review as I did on ios.  Update: Over eight months later and STILL NOT DONE ANY IMPROVEMENTS! I've bought a new Android tablet and got a new phone, both not cheapos and guess what? Still the same issues on my new devices. If I could get my money back I would.........

author: Carl Dorvil
comment: This would get 5 stars if the andriod app and the iphone app had the same features. I had an iphone and loved this app simply because of the clef note button feature. Upgraded to the s7 and downloaded the app, paid for upgrade and even bought djay 2 and was highly unsatisfied when i didnt see that feature.  Deleted djay 2, came on my chromebook and saw the feature in the photos and did the whole process again trying to get the iphone verison of this app on andriod and the only difference between the two is that feature, which makes mixing alot more fun. Please, I beg you, upgrade the app and add that feature. i dont want to get an iphone just to mix wen my extensive library of music is on my sd card. (which was the main reason I made the switch)

author: Randy Randerson
comment: Loved this when I bought it for my ipod, now the battery wont work so I bought an android. So do I have to pay again?  I technically already did but now i have the demo and miss out on my kick drums, samples etc. Got a transfer system???

author: Keiron Dineen
comment: Great app... If it ever worked. It's more unstable than Donald Trump. I can play 2 songs before it crashes and I have to restart the app
Hate it. You have to pay to get all the feautures,and i have to download spotify to use it. 100 percent would not recommend

author: Vikas Dosi
comment: Very bad crashed few times. Upgraded to pro and paid still not upgraded in 7 days. Sent few emails and always aurora reply asking version if djay, device, OS Version etc. Not recommended to upgrade.
Downloaded th app but got rid of it because it keeps crashing.. don't waste your time in downloading it.

author: Colette Taylor
comment: This app would have got 5 stars if it didn't keep crashing and losing the current track list. It's really fun and easy to use, however I will not end up using it in a public setting due to fear that it will crash halfway through a set! This has such potential to be an amazing app, please fix this bug!!

author: Jonathan Angeles
comment: What's with the decreased BPM on recorded mixes?! ... it seems with updates this app is hit or miss ... so far it's been way more misses ... what's going on? ... please fix this ... is starting to get annoying as hell

author: Stephen Koeleman
comment: solid app, please make keylock/timestretch available for samsung s8 and fix issues with recording tempo (atm the tempo resets to original,which makes recording useless... after these 2 issues are added/fixed, i'd be happy to give a solid 5 stars

Can't play wma files. I listen to all my wma music files on my phone with BlackPlayer and it plays wma files perfectly. Can't believe there is no wma support for this app. App is essentially useless to me. Come on!!

author: J Devereaux
comment: Improved latency?? No. Incredibly terrible app. Shocking.  Locking pretty much everything behind a paywall is cheap too. Shameful.

author: Kris Hudson-Lee
comment: 1* until that DJ2 FOR MAC advert disappears. Otherwise it's OK. A paid app SHOULD BE AD FREE.

author: Karl Cox
comment: laggy...but works. my iPhone 6 still on ios10 runs the same app better...and I'm using my 2XL lul.

author: Manuel Cadena
comment: I don't like that you can't manually enter in a desired tempo for a song rather than sliding around for the perfect tempo I want. you can hardly use this app if you don't have any music on your phone. You can't record your own sound samples or samples from other music. Can't record after music is opened. Can't delete custom recordings. Wish there were more cue points. Wish I could crop out parts of tracks or leave red flag markers. Ex. Cut out or mark where all the bad words are.  Wish there was a center track where I could create the finished piece as 1 mash up after editing, cutting, adjusting, moving, etc...

author: Tarickque Hines
comment: All the music i try recording all comes out slow. Was not having this problem before. Not sure what the problem os

author: Andy Harrod
comment: Have had this app for four years on my ipad and it works fine so thought I would get the full version for my galaxy tab2 but the pre cueing does not work no headphones showing above the volume sliders and no master volume when you select pre cueing

author: Christopher Clarkson
comment: It doesn't record anymore. Used to be a great app. Wasted my money on something that doesn't work

author: Jimako Norris
comment: I think it just slow you try to mix it's slow it's off beat you cannot blend the music in with the next one when I first got this app I was doing shows with it now I can mix it like I used to I just don't use it when I first purchase this app whatever y'all did to it bring it back because it just off

author: caracasBoy86
comment: I paid to unlock the rest of the features,  it work for the first hour but now it's not giving me access to it . How can u fixed this ? I get an error message when I try to record or to used any sound effects.  Can u fixed it? Or home me my money back ?

author: D'Mitri- Películas Y Música
comment: This app is a rip off, I just purchased the Pro version and the effects are so low that you can barely hear it above the music and this is having the volume for the effect all the way up. Also, you can't even use it on another device. I purchased it on my phone but really I was going to use it on my tablet but I can't do that. I want a refund!
Uhh... Crashes every time I try to access my Spotify account. So utterly useless to me. Can't think of using it for DJing if I can even use it at all.
If I'm playing a mix that is more than about 30 mins long, after about 10 mins the app restart the track from the beginning. Very annoying 😠🙈😠

author: Kris Smith
comment: Crashes constantly when loading music. Wouldnt bother. A shame because I used it a lot at first before the crashing became present in every use.

author: Jonathan Cummins
comment: The app doesn't even open for me. I just get a black screen. Gabe up after multiple attempts of staring at a black screen for minutes on end.

author: Jonathan Gutierrez
comment: Dude, I don't know why but recently when I record a song with an increased bpm, the song is slowed down after I stop recording. Please fix this!
Crashes and eats up battery , reboot every hour donot think it could be stable enough for live DJ set

author: tonieee Plouf!
comment: No sound at all on my Samsung Tab E! Which is a shame as it's the only DJ app I've found which shows the correct length of my mp3 files.

author: Aaron Holloway
comment: Doesn't want to work. This has been going on for two days, and it keeps saying it can't access any music
I made a spotty and didn't know that it needed premium and I got premium and it just searches and said that you need premium and I can use  spotify just fine so it is the app
Great app. Would give it 5 stars if It would not continously ask me to upgrade after I already purchased it in app. The Spotify integration makes it formidable. Good work!

author: Kris Legend
comment: Paid for the app still get pop ups to buy it. Constantly freezes and crashes. Always in the middle of a mix embarrassing..

author: SUBRAMANYAM. maddali
comment: App is so good because if we want listen dj songs we have to make our own ĎJ mix so I liked this app very much u can download it frnds

author: Andrew Blakely
comment: I'd like a refund for the pro please doesn't work with my Spotify so not much point for me

author: BLACK KNIGHT PRODUCTIONS
comment: WASTE OF MONEY , what's the point if you can't Q a playlist up and auto mix it ?

author: Android Master Gaming
comment: Downloaded it didn't even work just came up with there logo and the screen went black DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME

author: Anthony Chong
comment: Local music content access is still very rudimentary. No function to restrict music content to specific folders etc.

author: Shaliya Jones
comment: Paid the extra 2.99 to unlock the automix, doesn't work with my spotify. Waste of time and 3$.
